snippet: The Metropolitan Opera has 1,024 identically framed images on its Wall of Fame.
abstract: Metropolitan Opera's Wall of Fame displays 1,024 identically framed black-and-white photographs of the famed institution's luminaries, including singers, maestros, dancers, directors, designers and even some influential administrators.
lead_paragraph: The Metropolitan Opera has 1,024 identically framed images on its Wall of Fame.
